place.name: LLANSANWYR
place.gazetteerText: LLANSANNOR, a parish in Bridgend district, Glamorgan; on the river Sannor, 2 miles N of Cowbridge r. station. Post town, Cowbridge. Acres, 1,798. Real property, £1,513. Pop., 197. Houses, 42. The property is divided among a few. Llansannor House is now a farm-house. The living is a rectory in the diocese of Llandaff. Value, £105.* Patron, Sir J. Bailey, Bart. The church is dedicated to St. Senewyr, and is not very good. (In 1870-72, John Marius Wilson's Imperial Gazetteer of England and Wales)
